00026 Body::Body(CvPoint2D32f point, double height, double width, CNewVisionDoc* doc, int id, int frameNumber) {
00027         this->doc = doc;
00028         this->id = id;
00029         this->orientation = 0;  
00030         hc_prev = cvPoint2D32f(0,0);
00031         depthZ = 0;
00032         startFrame = frameNumber;
00033         stopFrame = frameNumber;
00034         invisibleFor = 0;
00035         dormantFor = 0;
00036         outsiderFor = 0;
00037         bot = cvPoint3D32f(point.x, point.y, 0);
00038         top = cvPoint3D32f(point.x, point.y, height);
00039         predicted = bot;
00040         widthRatio = width/height;
00041         confidence = 0;
00042         dHist = 0;
00043         KalmanInit();
00044 }
00045 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00046 Body::Body(BodyPath* path, CNewVisionDoc* doc, int frameNumber) {
00047         this->doc = doc;
00048         this->id = path->id;
00049         this->orientation = 0;
00050         hc_prev = cvPoint2D32f(0,0);
00051         depthZ = 0;
00052         startFrame = frameNumber;
00053         stopFrame = frameNumber;
00054         invisibleFor = 0;
00055         dormantFor = 0;
00056         outsiderFor = 0;
00057         Step step = path->GetAt(frameNumber-path->startFrame);
00058         bot.x = step.p.x;
00059         bot.y = step.p.y;
00060         bot.z = 0;
00061         top = bot; top.z = (float)step.height;
00062         widthRatio = step.width/step.height;
00063         orientation = step.orientation;
00064         predicted = bot;
00065         confidence = path->autoConfidence;
00066         dHist = 0;
00067         KalmanInit();
00068 }

00070 Body::Body(BlobRay* r, CNewVisionDoc* doc, int id, int frameNumber) {
00071         this->doc = doc;
00072         this->id = id;
00073         this->orientation = 0;
00074         hc_prev = cvPoint2D32f(0,0);

00076         startFrame = frameNumber;

00080         outsiderFor = 0;

00082         
00083         // extreeme case, the body is under the camera in spherical model
00084         //if (top.z == 0 && bot.z == 0)
00085         //      top.z = (float)doc->bodymodel.m_heightM;
00086         bot = cvPoint3D32f(top.x, top.y, 0);
00087         predicted = bot;
00088         widthRatio = INITIAL_WIDTH_RATIO ;
00089         confidence = 0;
00090         dHist = 0;
00091         KalmanInit();
00092 }

00154 void Body::HistogramCompute(IplImage* frame, CvHistogram* hist, int accumulate) {
00155         CvSize2D32f     axes = GetAxes();
00156 
00157         // generate binary body outline mask
00158         cvZero(mask); 
00159         
00160         // TEMP: don't use weights, instead sample all pixels within the reduced ellipsoid
00161         axes.height *= 0.7;
00162         axes.width *= 0.7;
00163         // END TEMP
00164         doc->cameramodel.DrawVerticalSpheroid(mask, GetCenter(), axes, cvScalar(1), true);
00165         cvThreshold(body_zbuffer, weight, depthZ, 1, CV_THRESH_BINARY_INV);
00166         cvAnd(mask, weight, mask);
00167 
00168         // find bounding box
00169         CvSeq* contour = cvCreateSeq(CV_SEQ_ELTYPE_GENERIC, sizeof(CvContour), sizeof(CvPoint2D32f), OpenCVmemory);
00170         cvFindContours(mask, OpenCVmemory, &contour, sizeof(CvContour), CV_RETR_CCOMP, CV_CHAIN_APPROX_SIMPLE);
00171         
00172         // x or y out of bounds? => no histogram
00173         if (!contour)
00174                 return;
00175 
00176         CvRect R = cvBoundingRect(contour);
00177         double s1 = R.width, s2 = R.height;
00178         int x1 = max(min(R.x, lab->width-1), 0);
00179         int y1 = max(min(R.y, lab->height-1), 0);
00180     int x2 = R.x+R.width; x2 = max(min(x2, lab->width-1), 0);
00181         int y2 = R.y+R.height; y2 = max(min(y2, lab->height-1), 0);
00182 
00183         // create weights matrix
00184         //cvZero(weight);
00185         //for (int x = x1; x <= x2; x++) {
00186         //      for (int y = y1; y <= y2; y++) {
00187         //              if (mask->imageData[y*mask->widthStep+x] != 0 && fg->imageData[y*fg->widthStep+x] != 0) {
00188         //                      // generate one element of anisotropic gaussian kernel
00189         //                      CvPoint3D32f p = doc->cameramodel.coordsImage2Real(cvPoint2D32f(x, y), bot, top);
00190         //                      double squareDist = d_2(p, GetCenter(), cvPoint3D32f(axes.width, axes.width, axes.height));
00191         //                      double k = exp(-squareDist);
00192         //                      weight->imageData[y*weight->widthStep+x] = round(weights_scale*k);
00193         //              }
00194         //      }
00195         //}
00196 
00197         // compute weighted histogram
00198         cvSetImageROI(frame, R);
00199         cvSetImageROI(mask, R);
00200         cvSetImageROI(weight, R);
00201         cvSetImageROI(lab, R);
00202         cvSetImageROI(l_plane, R);
00203         cvSetImageROI(a_plane, R);
00204         cvSetImageROI(b_plane, R);
00205 
00206         cvCvtColor(frame, lab, CV_BGR2Lab);
00207         cvCvtPixToPlane( lab, l_plane, a_plane, b_plane, 0 );
00208         IplImage* planes[] = { a_plane, b_plane };
00209 //      cvCalcHistWeighted(planes, hist, accumulate, mask, weight);
00210         cvCalcHist(planes, hist, accumulate, mask);
00211 
00212         cvResetImageROI(frame);
00213         cvResetImageROI(mask);
00214         cvResetImageROI(weight);
00215         cvResetImageROI(lab);
00216         cvResetImageROI(l_plane);
00217         cvResetImageROI(a_plane);
00218         cvResetImageROI(b_plane);
00219 }
00220 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00221 void Body::HistogramUpdate(IplImage* frame) {
00222         HistogramCompute(frame, this->color.h, 1 /*accumulate values*/);
00223 }
00224 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00225 void Body::KalmanCopy(CvKalman* src, CvKalman* dst) {
00226         cvCopy(src->state_post, dst->state_post);
00227         cvCopy(src->state_pre, dst->state_pre);
00228     cvCopy(src->transition_matrix, dst->transition_matrix);
00229         cvCopy(src->measurement_matrix, dst->measurement_matrix);
00230         cvCopy(src->process_noise_cov, dst->process_noise_cov);
00231         cvCopy(src->measurement_noise_cov, dst->measurement_noise_cov);
00232         cvCopy(src->error_cov_post, dst->error_cov_post);
00233         cvCopy(src->error_cov_pre, dst->error_cov_pre);
00234 }
00235 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00236 void Body::KalmanInit() {
00237         // ---------- Initialize posKalman
00238         // state is [x,y, dx,dy], measurement is [x,y]
00239         posKalman = cvCreateKalman( 4, 2, 0 );
00240         const float A[] = { 1, 0, 1, 0,
00241                                                 0, 1, 0, 1,
00242                                                 0, 0, 1, 0,
00243                                                 0, 0, 0, 1 };
00244         const float H[] = { 1, 0, 0, 0,
00245                                                 0, 1, 0, 0 };
00246         memcpy(posKalman->transition_matrix->data.fl, A, sizeof(A));
00247         memcpy(posKalman->measurement_matrix->data.fl, H, sizeof(H));
00248     cvSetIdentity( posKalman->process_noise_cov, cvRealScalar(doc->bodymodel.m_posModelNoise) );
00249     cvSetIdentity( posKalman->measurement_noise_cov, cvRealScalar(doc->bodymodel.m_posMeasurementNoise) );
00250         //cvSetIdentity( posKalman->error_cov_pre, cvRealScalar(1));
00251     //cvSetIdentity( posKalman->error_cov_post, cvRealScalar(1));
00252         
00253         // set the initial state to be the top position with 0 velocity
00254         cvmSet(posKalman->state_pre, 0, 0, bot.x);
00255         cvmSet(posKalman->state_pre, 1, 0, bot.y);
00256         cvmSet(posKalman->state_pre, 2, 0, 0);
00257         cvmSet(posKalman->state_pre, 3, 0, 0);
00258 
00259 
00260 }
00261 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00262 void Body::KalmanPredict() {
00263         // predict position
00264         const CvMat* pPrediction = cvKalmanPredict( posKalman );
00265         predicted = cvPoint3D32f((float)cvmGet(pPrediction,0,0), (float)cvmGet(pPrediction,1,0), 0);
00266 
00267         // predict orientation 
00268         double orOld = orientation;
00269 
00270         double nMatches = 0;
00271         CvPoint3D32f faceCenter = GetFaceCenter(imgFrame, nMatches); CvPoint3D32f headCenter = GetHeadCenter();
00272         double faceOrient = angle(cvPoint2D32f(headCenter.x, headCenter.y), cvPoint2D32f(faceCenter.x, faceCenter.y));
00273         double Pface = min(1, nMatches/MAX_COLOR_MATCHES);
00274 
00275         double motionOrient = angle(cvPoint2D32f(bot.x, bot.y), cvPoint2D32f(predicted.x, predicted.y));
00276         double Pmotion = min(1, d(cvPoint2D32f(bot.x, bot.y), cvPoint2D32f(predicted.x, predicted.y))/MAX_VELOCITY);
00277         double Pall = (Pface*FACE_ORIENT_WEIGHT+Pmotion*MOTION_ORIENT_WEIGHT);
00278         if (Pall == 0) // no change to the orientation
00279                 return;
00280 
00281         // BUG: ??? double-check sines and cosines
00282         double cc = PREV_ORIENT_WEIGHT*cos(orientation) + (1 - PREV_ORIENT_WEIGHT)*
00283                 (Pface*FACE_ORIENT_WEIGHT*cos(faceOrient) + Pmotion*MOTION_ORIENT_WEIGHT*cos(motionOrient))/Pall;
00284         double ss = PREV_ORIENT_WEIGHT*sin(orientation) + (1 - PREV_ORIENT_WEIGHT)*
00285                 (Pface*FACE_ORIENT_WEIGHT*sin(faceOrient) + Pmotion*MOTION_ORIENT_WEIGHT*sin(motionOrient))/Pall;
00286         orientation = atan2(ss, cc);
00287 
00288         //echo(String::Concat( S" id = ", __box(id), S":  err(x) = ", __box(posKalman->error_cov_pre->data.fl[0]), S":  err(y) = ", __box(posKalman->error_cov_pre->data.fl[2])));
00289         //echo(String::Concat( S" id = ", __box(id), S":  ", __box(faceOrient/PI), S", ", __box(faceAbs), S", ", __box(motionOrient/PI), S", ", __box(motionAbs), S" => ", __box(orientation)));
00290         //echo(String::Concat( S" id = ", __box(id), S":  ", __box(orOld/PI), S"->", __box(orientation/PI), S""));
00291 }
00292 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00293 void Body::KalmanObserve() {
00294         // observe position
00295         CvMat* oPosition = cvCreateMat(2,1,CV_32FC1); 
00296         cvmSet(oPosition,0,0,bot.x);cvmSet(oPosition,1,0,bot.y);
00297         cvKalmanCorrect(posKalman, oPosition);
00298         cvReleaseMat(&oPosition);
00299 }

00328 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00329 CvPoint3D32f Body::MeanShift(IplImage* frame, IplImage* FGmask) {
00330         if (cvCountNonZero(FGmask) == 0)
00331                 return bot;
00332 
00333         float min_value, max_value;
00334         cvGetMinMaxHistValue(color.h, &min_value, &max_value);
00335         if (max_value == 0)
00336                 return bot;
00337         
00338         cvCvtColor(frame, lab, CV_BGR2Lab);
00339         CvPoint3D32f foot, foot_new = bot;
00340 
00341         //if (OutOfBounds(GetHead(), frame) || OutOfBounds(GetFloor(), frame)) 
00342         //      return;
00343 
00344         int i=0;
00345         do {
00346                 // move to the new center
00347                 foot = foot_new;
00348                 foot_new = MeanShiftGetCenter(lab, FGmask, foot);
00349                 // ignore out of bounds bodies (TODO: what to do with partially out of bounds bodies?)
00350                 //if (OutOfBounds(center_new, frame))
00351                 //      return GetCenter();
00352                 i++;
00353         } while (d(foot, foot_new) > min_mean_shift_err && i < max_mean_shift_iter);
00354         
00356         //if (Double::IsNaN(foot_new.x))
00357                 
00358         
00359         // return the new bot position
00360         return cvPoint3D32f(foot_new.x, foot_new.y, bot.z);
00361 }
00362 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00363 CvPoint3D32f Body::MeanShiftGetCenter(IplImage* lab, IplImage* FGmask, CvPoint3D32f foot) {
00364         CvPoint3D32f center = cvPoint3D32f(foot.x, foot.y, foot.z + abs(top.z-bot.z)/2);
00365         CvPoint3D32f head = cvPoint3D32f(foot.x, foot.y, foot.z + abs(top.z-bot.z));
00366         CvPoint2D32f imcenter = doc->cameramodel.coordsReal2Image(center);
00367         CvPoint2D32f imhead = doc->cameramodel.coordsReal2Image(head);
00368         CvPoint2D32f imfoot = doc->cameramodel.coordsReal2Image(foot);
00369         CvSize2D32f     axes = GetAxes();
00370 
00371         // generate binary body outline mask
00372         cvZero(mask); 
00373         doc->cameramodel.DrawVerticalSpheroid(mask, center, GetAxes(), cvScalar(1), true);
00374         // find bounding box
00375         CvSeq* contour = cvCreateSeq(CV_SEQ_ELTYPE_GENERIC, sizeof(CvContour), sizeof(CvPoint2D32f), OpenCVmemory);
00376         cvFindContours(mask, OpenCVmemory, &contour, sizeof(CvContour), CV_RETR_CCOMP, CV_CHAIN_APPROX_SIMPLE);
00377         
00378         // x or y out of bounds? => no histogram
00379         if (!contour)
00380                 return foot;
00381 
00382         ASSERT(contour);
00383                 
00384         CvRect R = cvBoundingRect(contour);
00385         double s1 = R.width, s2 = R.height;
00386         int x1 = max(min(R.x, lab->width-1), 0);
00387         int y1 = max(min(R.y, lab->height-1), 0);
00388     int x2 = R.x+R.width; x2 = max(min(x2, lab->width-1), 0);
00389         int y2 = R.y+R.height; y2 = max(min(y2, lab->height-1), 0);
00390         // compute histogram
00391         double x0 = 0, y0 = 0, norm = 0;
00392 
00393         for (int x = x1; x <= x2; x++) {
00394                 for (int y = y1; y <= y2; y++) {
00395                         if (mask->imageData[y*mask->widthStep+x] != 0) {
00396                                 // generate one element of anisotropic gaussian kernel
00397                                 CvPoint3D32f p = doc->cameramodel.coordsImage2Real(cvPoint2D32f(x, y), foot, head);
00398                                 double squareDist = d_2(p, center, cvPoint3D32f(axes.width, axes.width, axes.height));
00399                                 // DEBUG ==========
00400                                 //double SCALE = 1500;
00401                                 //int cc = round(sqrt(squareDist)*SCALE);
00402                                 //Pixel px(cc,0,0); 
00403                                 //Image::setPixel(sceneImg, &px, x, y); 
00404                                 // END DEBUG ==========
00405 
00406                                 double k = exp(-squareDist);
00407                                 double a = (byte)lab->imageData[y*lab->widthStep+x+1];
00408                                 double b = (byte)lab->imageData[y*lab->widthStep+x+2];
00409                                 double h = color.GetValue(a, b);
00410                                 if (h && FGmask->imageData[y*FGmask->widthStep+x] != 0) {
00411                                         //x0 += k*h*x;
00412                                         //y0 += k*h*y;
00413                                         //norm += k*h;
00414                                         x0 += x;
00415                                         y0 += y;
00416                                         norm += 1;
00417                                 }
00418                         }
00419                 }
00420         }
00421         if (norm == 0)
00422                 return foot;
00423         CvPoint2D32f ccc = this->GetImageCenter();
00424         x0 /= norm; y0 /= norm;
00425         center = doc->cameramodel.coordsImage2Real(cvPoint2D32f(x0, y0), center.z);
00426         return cvPoint3D32f(center.x, center.y, foot.z);
00427 }
00428 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00429 double Body::GetVisiblePixelSize() {
00430         // apply exclusion mask formed by other bodies
00431         cvThreshold(body_zbuffer, weight, depthZ, 1, CV_THRESH_BINARY_INV);
00432         // superimpose binary body outline 
00433         cvZero(mask);RasterizeFrame(mask, cvScalar(1));
00434         cvMul(mask, weight, mask);
00435         return cvCountNonZero(mask);
00436 }

00440 };

00442 CvPoint3D32f Body::GetFoot() {
00443         return bot;
00444 }
00445 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00446 CvPoint3D32f Body::GetCenter() {
00447         return cvPoint3D32f((top.x+bot.x)/2, (top.y+bot.y)/2, (top.z+bot.z)/2);
00448 }
00449 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00450 CvPoint2D32f Body::GetImageFaceCenter(IplImage* frame, double& nMatches) {
00451         // create a mask of visible pixels
00452         cvZero(mask); 
00453         RasterizeHead(mask, cvScalar(1));
00454         cvThreshold(body_zbuffer, weight, depthZ, 1, CV_THRESH_BINARY_INV);
00455         cvAnd(mask, weight, mask);
00456 
00457         // find the center of skin color region
00458         CvPoint2D32f p = doc->skinmodel.GetSkinAreaCenter(frame, mask, nMatches);
00459 
00460         if (p.x == -1 && p.y == -1) // no skin found in head region
00461                 return GetImageHeadCenter();
00462         else
00463                 return p;
00464 }
00465 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00466 CvPoint2D32f Body::GetImageHeadCenter() {
00467         return doc->cameramodel.coordsReal2Image(GetHeadCenter());
00468 }
00469 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00470 CvPoint2D32f Body::GetImageHeadOpticalFlow(IplImage* frame) {
00471         CvPoint2D32f hc = GetImageHeadCenter();
00472         if (hc_prev.x == 0)
00473                 hc_prev = hc;
00474         CvPoint2D32f ht = GetImageHead();
00475         double R = d(hc, ht);
00476         const double BLOCKS_PER_HEAD = 5;
00477         int block_sz = max(1, (int)(2*R/BLOCKS_PER_HEAD));
00478         CvRect area = cvRect((int)(hc.x-R), (int)(hc.y-R), (int)(2*R), (int)(2*R));
00479         CvRect area_prev = cvRect((int)(hc_prev.x-R), (int)(hc_prev.y-R), (int)(2*R), (int)(2*R));
00480         cvCvtColor(frame, a_plane, CV_RGB2GRAY);
00481         cvCvtColor(imgPreviousFrame, b_plane, CV_RGB2GRAY);
00482         cvSetImageROI(a_plane, area);
00483         cvSetImageROI(b_plane, area_prev);
00484         cvSetImageROI(velx, area);
00485         cvSetImageROI(vely, area);
00486         cvCalcOpticalFlowLK(a_plane, b_plane, cvSize(block_sz, block_sz), velx, vely);
00487         double flowX = cvAvg(velx).val[0];
00488         double flowY = cvAvg(vely).val[0];
00489         cvResetImageROI(a_plane);
00490         cvResetImageROI(b_plane);
00491         cvResetImageROI(velx);
00492         cvResetImageROI(vely);
00493         hc_prev = hc;
00494         return cvPoint2D32f(flowX, flowY);
00495 }
00496 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00497 CvPoint3D32f Body::GetFaceCenter(IplImage* frame, double& nMatches) {
00498         // find the center of skin color region
00499         CvPoint2D32f faceCenter = GetImageFaceCenter(frame, nMatches);
00500         return doc->cameramodel.coordsImage2Real(faceCenter, (1-HEAD_HEIGHT/2)*top.z + HEAD_HEIGHT/2*bot.z);
00501 }
00502 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00503 CvPoint3D32f Body::GetHeadCenter() {
00504         return cvPoint3D32f(top.x, top.y, (1-HEAD_HEIGHT/2)*top.z + HEAD_HEIGHT/2*bot.z);
00505 }
00506 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00507 CvPoint2D32f Body::GetImageHead() {
00508         return doc->cameramodel.coordsReal2Image(top);
00509 };
00510 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00511 CvPoint2D32f Body::GetImageFoot() {
00512         return doc->cameramodel.coordsReal2Image(bot);
00513 }
00514 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00515 CvPoint2D32f Body::GetImageCenter() {
00516         return doc->cameramodel.coordsReal2Image(GetCenter());
00517 }
00518 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00519 CvSize2D32f Body::GetAxes() {
00520         double h = abs(top.z-bot.z)/2;
00521         double w = widthRatio*h;
00522         return cvSize2D32f((float)w, (float)h);
00523 }
00524 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00525 double Body::GetDistanceFromCamera() {
00526         // get the depth of the center of the body
00527         return doc->cameramodel.coordsDistanceFromCamera(GetCenter());
00528 }
00529 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00530 void Body::GetTagRect(CvRect& r) {
00531         CvFont  font;
00532         cvInitFont(&font, CV_FONT_HERSHEY_PLAIN, 1.0f, 1.0f);
00533         CvSize sz; int baseline; const OFFSET = 3;
00534         CString text; text.Format("%-d", (int)id);
00535         cvGetTextSize(text, &font, &sz, &baseline );
00536         r.x = (int)GetImageHead().x - 5 - OFFSET;
00537         r.y = (int)GetImageHead().y - 10 - OFFSET;
00538         r.width = sz.width+2*OFFSET;
00539         r.height = sz.height+2*OFFSET;
00540 }

00565 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00566 void Body::DrawFrame(CDC* pDC , int ox, int oy, CPen* pen )
00567 {
00568         // draw vertexes
00569         CPen* pOldPen = pDC->SelectObject(pen);
00570         doc->cameramodel.DrawVerticalSpheroid(pDC, GetCenter(), GetAxes());
00571         double size = 1.0;
00572         CPen   *penLabel = new CPen(PS_SOLID, 1, RGB(255,0,0));
00573         CBrush *brushLabel = new CBrush(RGB(255,255,255));
00574         pDC->SelectObject(penLabel);
00575         CBrush* pOldBrush = pDC->SelectObject(brushLabel);
00576         drawTextInRectangle(id, cvPoint((int)GetImageHead().x-5, (int)GetImageHead().y-10), pDC, size);
00577         pDC->SelectObject(pOldPen);
00578         pDC->SelectObject(pOldBrush);
00579         delete penLabel;
00580         delete brushLabel;
00581         return; 
00582 }

00603 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00604 void Body::DrawOrientationArrow(IplImage* frame, CvScalar color) {
00605         CvPoint3D32f begin = GetFoot();
00606         CvPoint3D32f end = cvPoint3D32f(begin.x+cos(orientation)*ARROW_LENGTH,
00607                 begin.y+sin(orientation)*ARROW_LENGTH, 0);
00608         if (begin.y*end.y > 0)
00609                 cvLine(frame, 
00610                         cvPointFrom32f(doc->cameramodel.coordsReal2Image(begin)), 
00611                         cvPointFrom32f(doc->cameramodel.coordsReal2Image(end)), color);
00612         else 
00613                 cvLine(frame, 
00614                         cvPointFrom32f(doc->cameramodel.coordsReal2Image(begin)), 
00615                         cvPointFrom32f(doc->cameramodel.coordsReal2Image(end)), color);
00616 
00617         cvCircle(frame, cvPointFrom32f(doc->cameramodel.coordsReal2Image(end)), 2, CV_RGB(255,0,0), 1);
00618 }
00619 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00620 void Body::DrawSectorHighlight(IplImage* frame) {
00621         CvPoint3D32f begin = GetFoot();
00622         CvPoint3D32f end1 = cvPoint3D32f(begin.x+cos(orientation - SECTOR_ANGLE)*ARROW_LENGTH,
00623                 begin.y+sin(orientation - SECTOR_ANGLE)*ARROW_LENGTH, 0);
00624         CvPoint3D32f end2 = cvPoint3D32f(begin.x+cos(orientation + SECTOR_ANGLE)*ARROW_LENGTH,
00625                 begin.y+sin(orientation + SECTOR_ANGLE)*ARROW_LENGTH, 0);
00626         CvPoint imbegin = cvPointFrom32f(doc->cameramodel.coordsReal2Image(begin));
00627         CvPoint imend1 = cvPointFrom32f(doc->cameramodel.coordsReal2Image(end1));
00628         CvPoint imend2 = cvPointFrom32f(doc->cameramodel.coordsReal2Image(end2));
00629         // create triangular mask 
00630         CvPoint pts[] = {imbegin, imend1, imend2};
00631         int nPts = 3;
00632         cvZero(mask);
00633         cvFillConvexPoly(mask, pts, nPts, cvScalar(1), CV_AA);
00634         
00635         // highlight the masked region
00636         Pixel p(50, 50, 100);
00637         Image::Highlight(frame, mask, &p);
00638         cvLine(frame, imbegin, imend1, CV_RGB(255,0,255));
00639         cvLine(frame, imbegin, imend2, CV_RGB(255,0,255));
00640 }
00641 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00642 void Body::DrawHeadArea(IplImage* frame, CvScalar color) {
00643         CvSize2D32f sz = GetAxes();
00644         sz.height *= (float)HEAD_HEIGHT; sz.width *= (float)HEAD_WIDTH;
00645         CvPoint3D32f ct = top;
00646         ct.z = (float)((1-HEAD_HEIGHT/2)*top.z + HEAD_HEIGHT/2*bot.z);
00647         doc->cameramodel.DrawVerticalSpheroid(frame, ct, sz, color);
00648 }

00675 void Body::RasterizeFloor(IplImage* frame, CvScalar color) {

00679 }

00683         sz.height *= (float)HEAD_HEIGHT; sz.width *= (float)HEAD_WIDTH;
00684         CvPoint3D32f ct = top;
00685         ct.z = (float)((1-HEAD_HEIGHT/2)*top.z + HEAD_HEIGHT/2*bot.z);

00693 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00694 void Body::DrawWeightMask(IplImage* frame) {
00695         CvSize2D32f     axes = GetAxes();
00696 
00697         // generate binary body outline mask
00698         cvZero(mask); 
00699         doc->cameramodel.DrawVerticalSpheroid(mask, GetCenter(), axes, cvScalar(1), true);
00700 
00701         // find bounding box
00702         CvSeq* contour = cvCreateSeq(CV_SEQ_ELTYPE_GENERIC, sizeof(CvContour), sizeof(CvPoint2D32f), OpenCVmemory);
00703         cvFindContours(mask, OpenCVmemory, &contour, sizeof(CvContour), CV_RETR_CCOMP, CV_CHAIN_APPROX_SIMPLE);
00704         
00705         // x or y out of bounds? => no histogram
00706         if (!contour)
00707                 return;
00708 
00709         CvRect R = cvBoundingRect(contour);
00710         double s1 = R.width, s2 = R.height;
00711         int x1 = max(min(R.x, lab->width-1), 0);
00712         int y1 = max(min(R.y, lab->height-1), 0);
00713     int x2 = R.x+R.width; x2 = max(min(x2, lab->width-1), 0);
00714         int y2 = R.y+R.height; y2 = max(min(y2, lab->height-1), 0);
00715         //echo(String::Concat(S"x1=", __box(x1), S" y1=", __box(y1), S" x2=", __box(x2), S" y2=", __box(y2)));
00716         // create weights matrix
00717         for (int x = x1; x <= x2; x++) {
00718                 for (int y = y1; y <= y2; y++) {
00719                         if (mask->imageData[y*mask->widthStep+x] != 0) {
00720                                 // generate one element of anisotropic gaussian kernel
00721                                 CvPoint3D32f p = doc->cameramodel.coordsImage2Real(cvPoint2D32f(x, y), bot, top);
00722                                 double squareDist = d_2(p, GetCenter(), cvPoint3D32f(axes.width, axes.width, axes.height));
00723                                 double k = exp(-squareDist);
00724                                 double weight = round(weights_scale*k);
00725                                 Pixel pixel(round(weight),0,0);
00726                                 Image::setPixel(frame, &pixel, x, y);
00727                         }
00728                 }
00729         }
00730 }
00731 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00732 CvRect Body::GetBoundingRect() {
00733         cvZero(temp);
00734         doc->cameramodel.DrawVerticalSpheroid(temp, GetCenter(), GetAxes(), cvScalar(1), true);
00735         CvSeq* contour = 0;             
00736         cvFindContours(temp, OpenCVmemory, &contour, sizeof(CvContour), CV_RETR_CCOMP, CV_CHAIN_APPROX_SIMPLE);
00737         if (contour != 0)
00738                 return cvBoundingRect(contour, 0);
00739         else 
00740                 return cvRect(0,0,0,0);
00741 }
